main event: A pilot of an F-89 jet observed a 'ball of light' during a turn, which appeared to follow him before disappearing.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 10 minutes,The object was approximately 1/2 to 3/4 mile away during the observation,The object was described as circular and bright gold,The pilot lost visual contact with the object due to haze,The report suggested the object might have been a weather phenomenon.
witness description: Pilot Captain Paul A. Charles and Co-pilot Baker, both USAF
